properties.verseOrder: c1 v1 c1 v2 c1 v3 c1 v4 c1 v5 c1

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Ya divai na ya mkate,
nyoyo zetu upokee.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Ya matendo na mawazo,
nia zetu upokee.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Ya Abeli iwe mfano,
sadaka hii ipendeze.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Mikononi mwake padre,
ni sadaka yetu sote.

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
Zigeuze mwili na damu
ya mwanao altareni.
